name: Bouncy Racing
description:
This game is still early in development, so don't expect much. Any suggestions are welcome.

CONTROLS

  Player 1 (Red car): Arrow keys

  Player 2 (Purple car): WASD

  Player 3 (Yellow car): TFGH

  Player 2 (Blue car): IJKL

Pix Riddim (the font used is the game) by Brixdee - http://www.dafont.com/profile.php?user=764521
